June 30, 1879 D Barrow Contest
Barrow Contest 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Barrow Contest barrow-contest
Barrow-in-Furness, Cumbria, England, UK Source: The Lancaster Gazette and General Advertiser for Lancashire, Westmorland, and Yorkshire (Lancaster, England), Saturday, July 05, 1879; Issue 4943. Maximum marks were 12, erwent Tin Plate given 0 mark.
9 bands competed
Quickstep: 1st divided between Leeds Model and Saltaire. 3rd Holborn, 4th Millom.
